statements: DELETE FROM rental_properties WHERE property_id = 100 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM rental_properties WHERE price > 2000 AND size < 1000;
DELETE FROM rental_listings WHERE listing_id = 101 AND location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM property_owners WHERE property_id = 200 AND contact LIKE '%@gmail.com'
DELETE FROM property_reviews WHERE property_id = 100 AND rating >= 4;
DELETE FROM property_images WHERE image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM property_images WHERE property_id = 200);
